brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts eight routers configured in two diamond topologies linked by one router to each diamond. The following are the commands issued to configure EIGRP.

Step 1
R1 (config) # router EIGRP
<1-65535> Autonomous System number
R1 (config) # router EIGRP 1

Step 2
R1 (config-router) # network 172.16.0.0

More Information Popup
The process ID references an instance of the EIGRP protocol running in a router. If there were two instances of EIGRP running on the same router at the same time, the process ID, or instance number, would separate and identify each individual process.
